data.persona: I am a farmer.  I grow wheat for the kingdom.  Most of the wheat is used to make bread.  I sell much of it to bakers.
data.description:
You are in the Main house.
A fairly plain wooden building, the fireplace in the center of the back wall provides warmth during the winter seasons. There are paintings on the wall showing the farmer's forefathers and the previous owners. The floor is adorned with animal pelt rugs, and wood crafted furniture for the farmers to sit in.
The helpers is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I need to follow the helpers to give them a sample of the specific wheat to harvest.
data.mid_motivation: I need the fully grown wheat to sell to the bakers at the marketplace.
data.long_motivation: I need to make sure the bakers get only the finest wheat so I can increase my prices and buy more land.
